2.0.name: wordpress/mhr-banner
2.0.description:
Floating footer banner

Publish your banner/advertisement in unique way, on page footer.Support all images format including bmp,jpeg, jpg,png,gif,etc.

visit plugin site: http://www.mahadirlab.com/en/mhr-banner

Please note

  • After activating this plugin please go to Settings menu and select enable MHR-Banner to enable it.
  • For Banner URL you must use full address with 'http://'.
  • Make sure your banner width setting did not exceed your width screen.
